text: the physios (ms Alexis, ms Kimberly) and pilates instructors (ms Julienne) are very knowledgeable and sweet! they've helped me to go through the toughest part of recovery journey from not able to walk or bend my arm until the end where i could run, and grow stronger! counter staffs, like Leo, are always friendly and have a smile on their faces. i would strongly recommend rapid physio to those who want to get stronger and have a smoother recovery :)

Visited RapidPhysiocare for a year now and my ACL/Meniscus rehab journey has been really effective and good! A very big thanks to Gerald, would highly recommend if you are looking for a good professional sports physiotherapist. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Cheers!

Came here to recover from my thigh strain after football. Gerald put together a great recovery plan and taught me various exercises that helped me get back to normal within weeks. He was also very knowledgeable and explained everything we went through.

I am extremely grateful to physiotherapist Ashika Shahnaz for her excellent care. She carefully treated me for my plantar fasciitis, and after just six therapy sessions, I noticed significant improvement‚Äîsomething I didn‚Äôt expect so quickly. With two additional sessions, my pain is now almost gone, which I hadn‚Äôt anticipated happening before flying back to my country.

I must mention that Ashika is very sweet and friendly. I really enjoyed our chitchat during the therapy, which helped me feel more comfortable and open with her.

Additionally, all the staff members are professional, polite, and well-mannered. I am very happy with their service and highly recommend them. Thank you so much!

Rahul is their best physio. I went for back stiffness release post partum and he was simply amazing. Highly experienced and understands body, muscles, pulls. When to push the patient for pilates or stretches perfectly. He was my God sent angel to relieve stiffness in back, glutes, neck, shoulders. Blessings and kindness to the healing handsüôè
